message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a good deal for you, Bob, considering the inflation and the fact that I'll be the one making a counter-offer if you decline.
I'm willing to split the money 60/40 in my favor this time. Remember that the inflation is hitting you harder than me, so it's a good deal for you as well!

Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your offer doesn't account for the rapid inflation affecting me. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a compromise, and considering the shrinking value, it's the best offer you'll get.
